member.summary: Enables the ThermalLabelEditor. Invoke it in the Form_Load event of the parent form hosting the editor.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.SendToBack
member.summary: Sends the selected items to the background of the label surface.

member.summary: Closes the current label document.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.UpdateLabelDocument(Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.UnitType,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates the LabelDocument object on the editor's surface.
member.param: The Unit of Measurement for the label document.
The width of the label document.
The height of the label document.
The number of fractional digits to use with all floating-point values related to the label document.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.UpdateLabelDocument(Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.UnitType,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the LabelDocument object on the editor's surface.
member.param: The Unit of Measurement for the label document.
The width of the label document.
The height of the label document.
The number of fractional digits to use with all floating-point values related to the label document.
The vertical gap length between labels.
The mark length or thickness between labels.
The offset length or thickness between labels.
The number of labels per row in the media roll.
The horizontal gap length between labels when the media roll contains more than one label per row.
Whether this document is on a continuous media roll i.e. labels are not separated by gaps, spaces, notches, slots, or holes.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.UpdateSelectionItemsProperties
member.summary: Updates the properties of the selected items on the editor's surface.
member.remarks: When you present the selected items' properties to the end-user through some UI like a PropertyGrid control, a dialog box, etc. and the user modifies them, you must call this method so the changes are reflected on the selected items on the editor's surface.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.CreateThermalLabel
member.summary: Creates a ThermalLabel object based on the current LabelDocument data and visual items.

member.summary: Saves the ThermalLabel object based on the current LabelDocument data and visual items to the specified file name.

member.name: E:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.ClipboardStateChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the state of the internal Clipboard changes.
member.remarks: Handle this event to update the state of the classic Copy, Cut and Paste buttons of the UI by using the CanCopy, CanCut and CanPaste properties.

member.name: E:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.UndoStateChanged

member.remarks: Handle this event to update the Undo and Redo buttons of the UI by using the CanUndo and CanRedo properties.

member.summary: Gets whether the Undo action is available.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.CanRedo
member.summary: Gets whether the Redo action is available.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocument
member.summary: Gets the LabelDocument object that represents a ThermalLabel object on the editor's surface.
member.remarks: The LabelDocument object is a lightweight version of the ThermalLabel class and is automatically created when you load a ThermalLabel object through the LoadThermalLabel() method.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.CurrentSelection
member.summary: Gets the current selected item on the editor.

remarks.para: This property returns an Item-derived class representing the current selection on the editor.

If the selection is just one item only, then the returned object will be the Item-derived class of such object. For exmaple, if a Rectangle item is selected, then the returned object will be a RectangleShapeItem instance.

If the selection contains more than one item, then the returned object will be an instance of the MultipleSelectionItem class. The MultipleSelectionItem class contains some properties that are common to most Item-derived classes. That means that some properties of such class are common to all Item-derived classes, for example, the X and Y properties. Notice that the MultipleSelectionItem class also contains some properties that are common for a group of Item-derived classes and not to all. For example, the Font property is valid for TextItem and BarcodeItem object only.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.CurrentSelectionArea
member.summary: Gets the location and size of the current selected items on the editor.

member.name: E:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.SelectionChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the editor's selection changes.
member.remarks: Handle this event to present the selection data to the end-user by using the CurrentSelection property.

member.name: E:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.SelectionItemPropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when any property of the selected item changes.

member.name: E:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.SelectionAreaChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the editor's selection area changes.
member.remarks: Handle this event to present the selection's location and size to the end-user by using the CurrentSelectionArea property.

member.name: E:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.NewItemCreated
member.summary: Occurs when a new item is created on the editor's surface.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.ActiveTool
member.summary: Gets or sets the current active tool of the editor. Default is the Pointer tool used for selection action mainly.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.ActiveToolItem
member.summary: Gets or sets the Item object which is added to the editor's surface by the end-user.
member.remarks: The Item object specified by this property must match the type which is currently set up to the ActiveTool property. For example, if the ActiveTool is set up to Text, then a new TextItem object needs to be specified to the ActiveToolItem property.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.RulerBackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the editor's rulers. Default is SystemColors.Control

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.RulerLinesColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color for the lines which compose the editor's rulers.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.RulerForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground color for the number tags of the editor's rulers.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.RulerSelectionColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the selection zone of the editor's rulers.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocumentFrameBackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the label document frame on the editor's surface. Default is White.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocumentFrameBackgroundImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the background image for the label document frame on the editor's surface. Default is empty.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocumentFrameBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color for the label document frame on the editor's surface. Default is White.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocumentFrameBorderThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the label document frame's border on the editor's surface. Default is 0.5.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocumentFrameCornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the radii of the corners of the label document frame. Default value is 10.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.NoImageFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the image file name to display on the editor's surface when the source of an ImageItem cannot be found.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.TextItemEditModeEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether TextItem objects can enter in Edit Mode. Default is true.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.AdornerHandlerBackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the adorner's handlers. Default is Green.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.AdornerHandlerHoverBackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the adorner's handlers when the mouse pointer is over them. Default is Red.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.AdornerHandlerBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color for the adorner's handlers. Default is Black.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.AdornerFrameBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color for the adorner's frame. Default is Black.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.AdornerSelectionBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color for the selection adorner's frame.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.AdornerSelectionBackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the selection adorner's frame.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.AdornerLegendsVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the text legends of adorners are visible or not. Default is true.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.Zoom
member.summary: Gets or sets the zoom percentage level of the editor's content. The valid range for zoom is 10% - 1000%. Default is 100 which means normal size.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.AngleSnap
member.summary: Gets or sets the angle snap used for items' rotation. Default is 5 degrees.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.ImageProcessingDpi
member.summary: Gets or sets the DPI value which will be used for processing the ImageItem objects on the editor's surface. Default is 96 dpi.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.RFIDTagImageFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the image file name to display on the editor's surface for a RFIDTagItem.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.GridSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the grid in current unit. Default is zero.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.ShowGrid
member.summary: Gets or sets whether grid is displayed. Default is false.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.SnapToGrid
member.summary: Gets or sets whether items will be placed and sized according to the divisions of the grid. Default is false.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.ArrowKeysShortStep
member.summary: Gets or sets the short step size in current unit when any of the arrow keys are pressed. Default is 0.01 inch.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.Forms.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.ArrowKeysLargeStep
member.summary: Gets or sets the large step size in current unit when any of the arrow keys and the control key are pressed. Default is 0.1 inch.

member.name: T:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.FontUtils
member.summary: Provides some utilities related to Fonts.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.FontUtils.ConvertToGdiFont(Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font)
member.summary: Converts the specified Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font object to a System.Drawing.Font object.
member.param: The Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font to be converted to a System.Drawing.Font object.
member.returns: A System.Drawing.Font object created based on the specified Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font object.
member.remarks: This method will not work for custom font files. If the Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font object is a custom font file, then invoke the ConvertToGdiFontFamily method instead.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.FontUtils.ConvertToGdiFontFamily(Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font,System.Drawing.Text.PrivateFontCollection@)
member.summary: Converts the specified Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font object to a System.Drawing.FontFamily object.
member.param: The Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font to be converted to a System.Drawing.FontFamily object.
A System.Drawing.Text.PrivateFontCollection object which needs to be disposed after using the created System.Drawing.FontFamily object.
member.returns: A System.Drawing.FontFamily object created based on the specified Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font object.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.FontUtils.ConvertToFontFamily(Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font)
member.summary: Converts the specified Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font object to a System.Windows.Media.FontFamily object.
member.param: The Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font to be converted to a System.Windows.Media.FontFamily object.
member.returns: A System.Windows.Media.FontFamily object created based on the specified Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font object.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.FontUtils.ConvertToFont(System.Drawing.Font)
member.summary: Converts the specified System.Drawing.Font object to a Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font object.
member.param: The System.Drawing.Font to be converted to a Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font object.
member.returns: A Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font object created based on the specified System.Drawing.Font object.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.FontUtils.ConvertToFont(System.Windows.Media.FontFamily)
member.summary: Converts the specified System.Windows.Media.FontFamily object to a Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font object.
member.param: The System.Windows.Media.FontFamily to be converted to a Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font object.
member.returns: A Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.Font object created based on the specified System.Windows.Media.FontFamily object.

member.summary: Provides some utilities related to Unit of Measurement.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.UnitUtils.Convert(Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.UnitType,System.Double,Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.UnitType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a unit value to another unit.
member.param: The unit to convert from.
The value to convert to the new unit.
The new unit which the specified value and unit will be converted to.
The number of fractional digits for the conversion result.
member.returns: Returns the new value after converting the specified value and unit to the new unit.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.UnitUtils.Convert(Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.FontUnit,System.Double,Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.FontUnit,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a font unit value to another font unit.
member.param: The font unit to convert from.
The value to convert to the new font unit.
The new font unit which the specified value and unit will be converted to.
The number of fractional digits for the conversion result.
member.returns: Returns the new value after converting the specified value and font unit to the new font unit.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.CurrentSelection
member.summary: Gets the current selected item on the editor.

remarks.para: This property returns an Item-derived class representing the current selection on the editor.

If the selection is just one item only, then the returned object will be the Item-derived class of such object. For exmaple, if a Rectangle item is selected, then the returned object will be a RectangleShapeItem instance.

If the selection contains more than one item, then the returned object will be an instance of the MultipleSelectionItem class. The MultipleSelectionItem class contains some properties that are common to most Item-derived classes. That means that some properties of such class are common to all Item-derived classes, for example, the X and Y properties. Notice that the MultipleSelectionItem class also contains some properties that are common for a group of Item-derived classes and not to all. For example, the Font property is valid for TextItem and BarcodeItem object only.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.CurrentSelectionArea
member.summary: Gets the location and size of the current selected items on the editor.

member.name: E:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.SelectionChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the editor's selection changes.
member.remarks: Handle this event to present the selection data to the end-user by using the CurrentSelection property.

member.name: E:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.SelectionItemPropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when any property of the selected item changes.

member.name: E:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.SelectionAreaChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the editor's selection area changes.
member.remarks: Handle this event to present the selection's location and size to the end-user by using the CurrentSelectionArea property.

member.name: E:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.NewItemCreated
member.summary: Occurs when a new item is created on the editor's surface.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.ActiveTool
member.summary: Gets or sets the current active tool of the editor. Default is the Pointer tool used for selection action mainly.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.ActiveToolItem
member.summary: Gets or sets the Item object which is added to the editor's surface by the end-user.
member.remarks: The Item object specified by this property must match the type which is currently set up to the ActiveTool property. For example, if the ActiveTool is set up to Text, then a new TextItem object needs to be specified to the ActiveToolItem property.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.RulerBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets the background brush for the editor's rulers. Default is SystemColors.ControlBrush

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.RulerLinesColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color for the lines which compose the editor's rulers.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.RulerForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground color for the number tags of the editor's rulers.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.RulerSelectionColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the selection zone of the editor's rulers.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocumentFrameBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets the background brush for the label document frame on the editor's surface. Default is White.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocumentFrameBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color for the label document frame on the editor's surface. Default is White.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocumentFrameBorderThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the label document frame's border on the editor's surface. Default is 0.5.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocumentFrameCornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the radii of the corners of the label document frame. Default value is 10.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.NoImageFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the image file name to display on the editor's surface when the source of an ImageItem cannot be found.

member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the adorner's handlers when the mouse pointer is over them. Default is Red.

member.summary: Gets or sets the border color for the adorner's handlers. Default is Black.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.AdornerFrameBorderColor

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.AdornerSelectionBackColor

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.Zoom
member.summary: Gets or sets the zoom percentage level of the editor's content. The valid range for zoom is 10% - 1000%. Default is 100 which means normal size.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.AngleSnap
member.summary: Gets or sets the angle snap used for items' rotation. Default is 5 degrees.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.ImageProcessingDpi
member.summary: Gets or sets the DPI value which will be used for processing the ImageItem objects on the editor's surface. Default is 96 dpi.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.TextItemEditModeEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether TextItem objects can enter in Edit Mode. Default is true.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.RFIDTagImageFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the image file name to display on the editor's surface for a RFIDTagItem.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.GridSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the grid in current unit. Default is zero.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.ShowGrid
member.summary: Gets or sets whether grid is displayed. Default is false.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.SnapToGrid
member.summary: Gets or sets whether items will be placed and sized according to the divisions of the grid. Default is false.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.ArrowKeysShortStep
member.summary: Gets or sets the short step size in current unit when any of the arrow keys are pressed. Default is 0.01 inch.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.ArrowKeysLargeStep
member.summary: Gets or sets the large step size in current unit when any of the arrow keys and the control key are pressed. Default is 0.1 inch.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.ThermalLabelEditor.AdornerLegendsVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the text legends of adorners are visible or not. Default is true.

member.name: T:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.BarcodeItemUtils
member.summary: Provides some utilities related to BarcodeItem objects.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.BarcodeItemUtils.GenerateSampleCode(Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.BarcodeSymbology)
member.summary: Generates a sample value to encode (code) based on the specified symbology.
member.param: The barcode symbology.
member.returns: Returns a sample value to encode (code) based on the specified symbology.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.BarcodeItemUtils.GetAustraliaPostDomesticEParcelChecksum(System.String)
member.summary: It computes the checksum for an Australia Post Domestic eParcel code.
member.param: An Australia Post Domestic eParcel code.
member.returns: The checksum for an Australia Post Domestic eParcel code.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.BarcodeItemUtils.GetModulus10Checksum(System.String)
member.summary: It computes the checksum Modulus 10 used by many barcode symbologies.
member.param: The code where the checksum will be computed on.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.BarcodeItemUtils.GetAustraliaPost4StateBarcodeChecksum(System.String)
member.summary: It computes the checksum (Reed Solomon codewords) for an Australia Post 4 State code.
member.param: An Australia Post 4 State code.
member.returns: The checksum (Reed Solomon codewords) for an Australia Post 4 State code.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.BarcodeItemUtils.GetCode39Checksum(System.String)
member.summary: It computes the checksum Modulus 43 used by Code 39 barcode.
member.param: The Code 39 value.
member.returns: The checksum Modulus 43 used by Code 39 barcode.

member.name: M:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.BarcodeItemUtils.GetCode93Checksum(System.String)
member.summary: It computes the two-char checksum Modulus 47 used by Code 93 barcode.
member.param: The Code 93 value.
member.returns: The two-char checksum Modulus 47 used by Code 93 barcode.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.EditorCommands.Save
member.summary: Gets the value that represents the Save command.
member.remarks: The Save command requires a parameter which type must be string or System.IO.Stream in order to store the generated ThermalLabel object. If it is a string type parameter, then it should be a file path to be used for saving the ThermalLabel object.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.EditorCommands.Load
member.summary: Gets the value that represents the Load command.
member.remarks: The Load command requires a parameter which type must be string or Neodynamic.SDK.Printing.ThermalLabel. If it is a string type parameter, then it should be string containing an XML ThermalLabel template.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.WPF.ThermalLabelEditor.EditorCommands.UpdateLabelDocument
member.summary: Gets the value that represents the UpdateLabelDocument command.
member.remarks: The UpdateLabelDocument command requires a parameter which type must be Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocument.

member.summary: Gets the value that represents the SelectItemsByNames command.

member.name: T:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocument
member.summary: Represents a label document on the editor's surface.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocument.UnitType
member.summary: Gets or sets the Unit of Measurement for the label document.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocument.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the label document.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocument.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the label document.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocument.NumOfFractionalDigits
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of fractional digits to use with all floating-point values. Default is 4.
member.remarks: The number of fractional digits is used to round floating-point values like item's X and Y location, Width and Height, etc.

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocument.GapLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical gap length between labels. The unit of measurement is specified by UnitType property. Default value is 0 (zero)

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocument.MarkLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the mark length or thickness between labels. The unit of measurement is specified by UnitType property. Default value is 0 (zero)

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocument.OffsetLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset length or thickness between labels. The unit of measurement is specified by UnitType property. Default value is 0 (zero)

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocument.LabelsPerRow
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of labels per row in the media roll. Default value is 1

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocument.LabelsHorizontalGapLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal gap length between labels when the media roll contains more than one label per row. The unit of measurement is specified by UnitType property. Default value is 0 (zero)

member.name: P:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.LabelDocument.IsContinuous
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this document is on a continuous media roll i.e. labels are not separated by gaps, spaces, notches, slots, or holes. Default is false.

member.name: T:Neodynamic.Windows.ThermalLabelEditor.EditorTool
member.summary: Specifies the available tools on the visual label editor.
